body.name: Labiotte Hyalbiome Water Cream 1.7 Fl Oz | Korean Beauty Moisturizer & Face Cream| Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin| Hydrating Face Moisturizer & Face Cream| Lactic Acid Moisturizing Face Cream for Women

Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 47 mins
features: ✅HYDRATION SUPPORT. Transform your skin with our luxurious facial moisturizer that’s infused with Lactobacillus, Lysate Bifida, & Lactococcus ferment lysates for a powerful hydration boost. Perfect for dull, dehydrated skin to achieve a bright and glowing complexion.

✅DEFENDS & REJUVENATES. This moisturizer face cream is formulated with Lactobacillus Fermentation for revitalizing & defensive benefits. It also contains hyaluronic & lactic acid which improves skin hydration, elasticity, & wound repair for a glowing, radiant complexion.

✅STRENGTHENS SKIN’S DEFENSE BARRIER. This face moisturizer for women is infused with Lactococcus ferment lysate to balance the skin's microbiome & strengthen defenses. Provides optimal hydration, reduces pain & redness, improves fine lines & wrinkles, and reduces breakouts.

✅REVITALIZES THE SKIN. This luxurious face cream has an active ingredient of Lysate Bifida Fermentation Lysate which blocks sun damage, hydrates, strengthens immunity, soothes pain, and reduces dry skin leaving you a more revitalized skin with a brighter, smoother, and glowing look.

✅FAST ABSORPTION. Our water-based cream is fast-absorbing and refreshing, delivering active ingredients deep into the skin for optimal results. Its quick-drying, non-greasy formula won't leave a sticky feel, so you can enjoy hydration and nourishment for more glowing skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Trifecta to TRANSFORM your skin from DEEP WITHIN HYALBIOME 72% Intensively moisturizes with 3 Types of Probiotics infused with Micromolecule Hyaluronic Acid ECOCERAMIDE Strengthens skin barrier, fortifying its function of defending against external stressors. DEXPANTHENOL Make it double. Strengthens skin barrier while soothing and calming irritated skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight gel provides instant hydration
reviews.reviewText: I love using water cream moisturizers because the absorb easily and provide moisturization without sitting on top of my skin or feeling heavy. This Labiotte cream is everything I want in a water cream and I really like it. It has an ultra lightweight, silky gel texture and my skin absorbs it instantaneously. I live in the desert and sometimes my skin needs even more moisture. On those days, I use this cream for the hydrating, plumping effects and I wear a heavier moisturizer on top to seal it all in. I also appreciate that this product isn’t heavily scented because I use products from different lines and I am not a fan of heavy scents that compete with each other.The bottom line is this: when I run out of Labiotte water cream, I will place another order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sent product that expires in 2 months
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure whether this is typical or not but I received my order on 5/29 and expiration date on box is 7/25. Product container is small, so maybe one could finish the bottle before expiring? Feels nice and light; not sticky; leaves skin soft and has faint baby powder scent. Great for summer and pairs well under makeup & other moisturizers/facial oils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this face cream.. I also like the way it smells and the way it seems to make me feel less dry... A great cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super moisturizing and totally hydrating, this cream is great for sensitive skin and it replenishes dry skin all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cream and it comes with a spatula!
reviews.reviewText: This cream feels luxurious. It is non-irritating to my sensitive skin. It absorbs well and doesn't leave my skin feeling sticky. It doesn't have a bad smell.The jar is very pretty, and I love that it comes with a spatula too. It's very elegant looking.My favorite part is how it felt when I put it on. My skin felt cooled and soothed when I applied it. It was quite nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love everything this cream!
reviews.reviewText: The jar is just as beautiful as the product itself. It is lightly scented and the floral fragrance is right up my alley. Goes on smoothly like silk and leaves skin feeling velvety soft. My skin feels refreshed and hydrated without any weight or stickiness added on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing and Effective Cream!
reviews.reviewText: Another K beauty keeper for me. This water cream had me at lactic acid, which always delivers gentle exfoliation and a lovely glow. The ingredient "hyalbiome" appears to be trademarked by Labiotte. I assume it is a hyaluronic acid derivative and the moisture delivering agent of this formula. Kudos to them for including a cute little lucite scoop so you don't contaminate your product. The consistency is gel like and spreads and absorbs readily. My dry skin feels very hydrated. It has the faintest of fresh scents. The packaging is downright luxurious if you keep your products on a vanity.Nice way to start my day with this water cream!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No full ingredients disclosure
reviews.reviewText: I use this for my face and neck that are very dry. I really like that you don't need a lot. Skin feels very refreshed and hydrated after application. I'm applying it twice a day, early in the morning and afternoon. It smells nice and subtle, which I appreciate enormously! Unfortunately, the full list of ingredients is not disclosed, neither if these is cruelty free. This comes from Korea, and most of the printing in the box is in tier language. I wish they'd be more transparent. taking a star for this reason.
